name: x64 dungeon
description:
What is it?

this is a very simple dungeon crawler made so both the background and the spritesheet would fit in 64x64 pixels, and I did it just for fun with godot engine. It tokk me about a week in total, including hours I didn't spend on the project (otherwise it would be something like 50 hours?)

some stuff was of course left unused.

who are you?

an artist with a lot of interests, including but not limited to videogames and fantasy.
